lexicon.botanicalmachinery.title: Botanical Machinery
lexicon.botanicalmachinery.description: Make your farms more compact. This is the chapter for Botanical Machinery, a mod by $(item)MelanX$().
It is said that $(d)Elementium$(0) possesses certain properties, many of which still need to be uncovered. Using the $(l:botania:baubles/aura_ring)Greater Band of Aura$(), one can put $(d)Elementium$(0) under a constant stream of Mana. Thus, increasing the effectiveness of a botanist's machines by introducing them to the world of modern technology. However, even the elves don't fully grasp the extend of this undergoing and it is unknown if it's safe to tinker with these machines in such a way.
By using the power of the $(l:botania:alfhomancy/gaia_ritual)Gaia$() you can upgrade a $(l:botania:baubles/mana_ring)Greater Band of Mana$() to create a block that can store ten times as much as a single mana pool. You can as well automate filling and emptying mana tablets with hoppers.
lexicon.botanicalmachinery.alfheim_marke: This single block has a tiny version of an Alfheim Portal inside. It allows for trade with the elves without the need of having a gigantic portal around. Just be careful not to put any bread inside...
lexicon.botanicalmachinery.industrial_ag: Can only be powered by green energy

The $(l:botania:basics/terrasteel)terra plate$() usually requires a stabilising platform underneath it. Not anymore with this device. This machine is pretty unknown to the regular botanist, so give it a shot!
lexicon.botanicalmachinery.mechanical_ma: Just like a regular $(l:botania:mana/pool)Mana Pool$(), this can store quite some mana. It is also capable of mana infusion. As with any other pool, you can use catalysts. However, this pool requires you to put them into its inventory and not to place them below it.
lexicon.botanicalmachinery.mechanical_ru: This device allows you to create runes much a lot more easily. Really, it's nothing more than a normal $(l:botania:basics/rune_altar)Rune Altar$(), which can be automated using hoppers.
lexicon.botanicalmachinery.mechanical_da: By planting a Floating $(l:botania:basics/pure_daisy)Pure Daisy$() onto a platform made out of $(d)Elementium$(0), it is capable of processing 8 blocks at once in only a single block space. It can also handle fluids.
lexicon.botanicalmachinery.mechanical_br: An improved version of the $(l:botania:devices/brewery)Botanical Brewery$() that receives mana from sparks and lets you automate brews easily.
lexicon.botanicalmachinery.mechanical_ap: An improved version of the $(l:botania:basics/apothecary)Apothecary$() that uses water, seeds and ingredients to create all the flowers your heart desires.
